means: 重还，归还，承受转归领主的土地

sentence.Network_en: The dormant account reverted to the state under escheat laws.
sentence.Network_cn: 根据充公法律规定,休眠账户归国家所有.

sentence.Network_en: The lord lost his claims to escheat.
sentence.Network_cn: 土地领主失去了归还土地的请求权.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(E2)|无忧教育 ... eschatology 末世学 escheat 重还 escheatage 归属权.
4、充公权(Escheat)。当房地产所有者死后无合法继承人，或未留遗嘱变成无主房地产的，或犯有重罪影响对房地产的占有的，联邦和 …
... Escalator Clause（ 调整条款）－ 成本、费用、租金等可以上下调节的条款。 Escheat（ 土地充公）－ 由州政府没收产权。.

list.abs: escheatage 归属权escheator 充公产业官员escheatorship 充公产业官员
doctrine of consistency 一贯原则doctrine of intestate escheat 没收无遗嘱的财产税doctrine of strict compliance 严格符合主义
the escheat principle of treasure trove ., 政府所有的原则.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French eschete, based on Latin excidere 'fall away', from ex- 'out of, from' + cadere 'to fal'

means.word_mean: 1. a reversion to the state (as the ultimate owner of property) in the absence of legal heirs
2. the property that reverts to the state

auth_sentence.content: Without any other beneficiary the whole amount would escheat to the State.
auth_sentence.res_content: Without any other beneficiary the whole amount would escheat to the State.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Without any other beneficiary the whole amount would escheat to the State.
